scripts.dev: npm run clean && rm -f .chrome-profile/{chrome.pid,SingletonLock,SingletonCookie,SingletonSocket} && vite dev
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run clean && mkdir -p build/dev/firefox && cp -r .firefox-profile build/dev/firefox/profile && BROWSER=firefox vite dev
scripts.build:safari: BROWSER=safari vite build && xcrun safari-web-extension-converter build/production/safari/extension --project-location build/production/safari/xcode --app-name 'Stream Keys' --bundle-identifier com.streamkeys.extension --force --no-prompt --no-open && cd build/production/safari/xcode/'Stream Keys' && xcodebuild -scheme 'Stream Keys (macOS)' -configuration Release -derivedDataPath ../DerivedData CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY=- && cd ../.. && rm -rf dmg-contents && mkdir -p dmg-contents && cp -R xcode/DerivedData/Build/Products/Release/'Stream Keys.app' dmg-contents/ && hdiutil create -volname 'Stream Keys' -srcfolder dmg-contents -ov -format UDZO stream-keys-safari.dmg && rm -rf dmg-contents
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.package: rm -rf build/production && npm run build && npm run build:firefox && cd build/production/chrome/extension && zip -r ../../stream-keys-chrome.zip . && cd ../../firefox/extension && zip -r ../../stream-keys-firefox.zip .
